Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Correctional \Cor*rec"tion*al\ (k?r-r?k"sh?n-al), a. [Cf. F. correctionnel.] Tending to, or intended for, correction; used for correction; as, a correctional institution. [1913 Webster]
correctional adj : concerned with or providing correction; "a correctional institution"
